website_summaries.verdict: Adds a stylish luau vibe at yard parties.
pros: Earns top marks for lasting 8 to 10 hours
cons: If you don't take them inside during winter, they may rot or shred

customer_reviews.title: Mold after one use, please stay away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these ignoring the other reviews concerning mold, thinking people were leaving them out in the rain. I used these once for a BBQ on a clear day, during the following days I left them out, but there was no rain just misty in the mornings. There was rain expected the coming weekend, so I took them out and placed them in the garage figured would not use them for a while anyway. The next time I stopped in the garage I noticed small black spots were building up on them, which within a month turned into large mold growth. Do yourself a favor and do not purchase these torches.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Maier

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: Ok for price. 4 for 24. Problem is that too the wicks are too close to the rim. The top is flat not raised as is shown in current profile. Would not buy again. Update...i put a thin collar of aluminum foil underneath the lid in between the top part in the bamboo part to provide fire protection against the wind blowing the flame over the side and it seems to work well and doesn't look totally stupid. I'm okay with the modification and if you are then I would go ahead and buy them and just put a little bit of aluminum foil around the top to protect them all over
customer_reviews.author: Arvin

customer_reviews.title: Good, but look in stores
customer_reviews.text: These work well, but unlike many other products, these are cheaper in local stores. Don't buy them online unless you have little option.
customer_reviews.author: R. Peat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the torches but found them cheaper at the local Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: R Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Effective
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! Even though the bottoms are sharpened into a stake, if the ground is really hard it will be a difficult task to place them. However, that is the only comment I can make that is a warning. These are a nice height. They hold a good amount of oil and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: retro look and good function.
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to look cheap. Instead they look retro and very nice for my back yard purposes. They have worked well in one party and one wedding.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy/Fragile and Deceptive Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I had 1 of the 4 tiki torches break immediately when I staked it into the ground. I tried to be very delicate, and the bottom split day 1. It's also fairly deceptive that it continues to advertise how this comes with easy pour cans - yet there is no actual oil included. I don't care how the stuff pours if I don't have anything to pour in it. I had to purchase the oil separately. Usually in the Q/A, you can find information about whether or not it requires an additional item purchase to actually use the product. Very bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good for a season
customer_reviews.text: Used these summer 2018 (the summer we got them) and they worked decently. Got them out again this summer (2019) and they caught on fire. Did my normal thing of filling them up, letting them soak before lighting them..they weren't lit more than an hour and i looked over to see that they caught fire. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I expected better quality with the brand name
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t very sturdy; they’re kind of flimsy with the weaving part. But they worked great. I would definitely buy them again due to the good price.
customer_reviews.author: L Ancelet

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Every one locally was out of Tiki lamps. We purchased these. They work fine. We leave the wick very low because a high flame is difficult to snuff out without burning oneself. The review asked us to rate warmth. If you were putting your hands directly next to the flame, it would be warm. At a distance, not warm at all. We got these to chase bugs away and that function seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Rod T.

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much for the price. They are very reasonable for four tiki torches. The cans are Ok and the construction is as well. They are very thin poles and barely 57". In fact, two of the four are a bit shorter. The last ones I purchased locally cost about the same but were several inches taller, and the pole itself was far thicker. They come complete with snuff caps and decent wicks, and the cans seem well made. Since these are holding a burning flame I think I will opt for spending a little more and getting something a bit thicker and taller.
customer_reviews.author: B. Colonna

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! The Tiki Torch caught fire the second time it was used. It was a night where there was no wind.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Fear

customer_reviews.title: Caught FIRE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great deal and I just remodeled my yard. I had a family gathering (a week later) with young children and it was the 2nd time using them. While outside preparing for the BBQ 2 of the 4 caught fire! !! The bamboo holders were burning but nothing exploded, Luckily I was outside by myself and I noticed them behind me & no damage to my home or family! all 30ft away from each other and nothing obstructing themWill be asking Amazon for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maeweather

customer_reviews.title: Got black Mold in under 2 months - Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these to anyone, all 4 of my torches got black mold all over them when they were outside for less than 2 months. I tried power washing them and gave up as I'd rather just get something better. If they can't even last in the midwest, not sure how they can survive anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: A Ripoff!
customer_reviews.text: These things are among the poorest made of this type. They are not tall enough. The stake is not pointed allowing for easy entry into the ground. The slightest wind blows them over plus you can find the same type at Lowe’s for less money are better made. Overall these were a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: AeroEng

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. Caps can burn off.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping. Not that cheap but works as supposed to with mosquito repellent oil. Only issue is that the little caps to put off the flame are ALSO in Bamboo, and I burned 2 trying to put them over the flame to extinguish the fires. Bad design conception but just find another way to put off the flames.
customer_reviews.author: Magouille

customer_reviews.title: I like the wicks
customer_reviews.text: These are what you would expect. I like the wicks. Way better than some others i have seen around town. I store mine in the shed when not in use and i hope they last a while. Bite fighter fuel is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Pillitiere

customer_reviews.title: I love these torches
customer_reviews.text: I love these torches. They run on diesel too but get a little smokey. My neighbors asked if I was holding a Klan rally. No idea what that meant. Burn for hours too!
customer_reviews.author: Tahco Gunworks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our Hawaii Party at work and these were a hit. I had to take these out of the package to be able to fit in my car. I’d recommend this for anyone who needs to transport these. The price was better to purchase on Amazon than any other local big box retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fires
customer_reviews.text: Beware!! I lit 4 of these torches today, 2 of them burned, 1 completely through and down the holder, the can was only being held by the metal ring, and 1 started to burn down. None of the fluid was spilled on the holders and they were filled and then put into the holder. Big waste of money. Luckily they were set in the yard and nothing caught on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rodionoff

customer_reviews.title: May break when pushing into ground
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. For the quality, should have gone to the dollar store. Bases are thin and two broke while being pushed in the flowerbeds. Top basket is not woven well—comes apart. Cheaply made. For the quality, too much cost. Dollar store tikis would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Most dangerous product I ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: First day of use, this piece of garbage caught on fire in the middle of a BBQ. Wife screamed from the kitchen window and there I was running out to the back yard with the fire extinguisher. Word of advice...always go with metal... Forget this bamboo garbage...
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Met my needs and more
customer_reviews.text: I only wanted 2 though this was the cheapest I found. I camp a lot over the summer and these held up pretty well. When it is windy the flame will burn the bamboo holder some. For the price you can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Nice mold farm
customer_reviews.text: They all started growing mold all over them within a month of having them. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Basic Tiki Torch
customer_reviews.text: I bought a ton of these to put up around my back porch. They are very nice and seem to be holding up very well. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for inexpensive tiki torches.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shredder

customer_reviews.title: Use at campsite
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the campsite, I use them for the season and then replace the following season, I don't have to worry about storing them.
customer_reviews.author: tammy cowette

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Pleasing
customer_reviews.text: It gives an nice aesthetic to our campsite. I went with the citronella oil and it burned well. The only downside is, it's obviously a lot bulkier so not as easy to transport without risking the woven heads.
customer_reviews.author: LolaBeans

customer_reviews.title: Actually really good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some bad reviews, I still decided to give these a try. I’m glad I did, none of them came broken and they lasted through my whole party! I’ve had them for a while now and they haven’t molded or anything, like I read in some reviews.
customer_reviews.author: kiana

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable torches
customer_reviews.text: Torches are as described and work well. Ended up using some piping in the ground to “mount” the torches in so we can easily put them up and take them down without worrying about them getting weathered.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great way to beat the retailer.
customer_reviews.text: I received 4 actual TIKI brand torches, no broken pieces, durable bamboo, exactly the same as you would find at Walmart or a similar store but at a lower cost. No brainer if you are in the market for some TIKI torches.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: The poles are very thin. You can’t drive them in the ground. They break easily. They were bent at the top at the base of the can. Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Rose

customer_reviews.title: These look great and are easy to use but be cautious because ...
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are easy to use but be cautious because the bamboo can cut you very easily. Mildews very quickly and starts to splinter very quickly. Take inside during rain and weather if you want these to last. Within a couple of weeks these were breaking down, in the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Confette

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: They are tiki torches. Works great no problems. I wish they were a little taller but other than that they are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't refill
customer_reviews.text: Ours have somehow sealed shut after the first use? We had it going almost all day since the biters are really bad here, the next day I asked my husband to refill them and they are so stuck one crushed a little like a can. They worked really well for the day 😩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use planters
customer_reviews.text: These are a great bang for your buck!! I'd definitely recommend buys a couple small plastic planters and a small bag of cement to put them in. Makes things 1000 easier for moving them around the yard!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Nice tikis that stay lit!
customer_reviews.text: These tikis are nice! They stayed burning thanks to their thick wicks.
customer_reviews.author: Lakegirl11

customer_reviews.title: OK Product
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for a while, but kinda started falling apart and splitting after about a year outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Just not the quality they used to be
customer_reviews.text: The oil cans are smaller, and the wicks burn very high. I've tried trimming them. But they flame high, and use up most of the can in just one evening. I will buy something else next season. The Tiki ones I had a few years ago were by far better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but 1 was different color than the rest
customer_reviews.text: They arrived very quickly and are easy to out up. The only thing that really sucked was 1 torch was a dark brown while the others were the light tan bamboo color. Other than that they look great on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: alana wallace

customer_reviews.title: Caught fire please don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: Please please be careful with this product 2 of the lamps caught on fire Very dangerous
customer_reviews.author: patricia cherasard

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer .
customer_reviews.text: These are good one did recently catch on fire though around the wooden part but other than that they have worked good for me.
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: All were in good shape and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: All were in good shape and nice looking. I only use them for parties, so I can't comment on how they how up to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: Was just as expected. Used the tiki torchs for ...
customer_reviews.text: Was just as expected. Used the tiki torchs for a party Luau and if was a success. *note must buy lightee fluid for the tiki torchs
customer_reviews.author: j.est

customer_reviews.title: Quality not very good
customer_reviews.text: They are very weak. As soon as I unpacked the 4 of them 2 of them unraveled and broke around the top where the fluid container is.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J.

customer_reviews.title: 4 pack Tiki Torches
customer_reviews.text: Best VALUE and just like the ones from Home Depot! Add fuel and your ready. They are not extremely tall but perfect for campsite and backyard coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Russell B

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Awful!!!! 2 of them came cracked down the middle!!!! Poorly made and didn't last but 2 months!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bradford

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They seem a bit cheap but what can you expect for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: good price on here
customer_reviews.text: They are good. Just like any you see in the stores.one came without a wick. It’s still sealed in plastic with no wick
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy-to-use and put out great light and mosquito control. If you buy these, buy extra oil. The gallon size only filled the 12 I bought twice.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: They’re your typical tiki torch! They work good but will deteriorate over time! They work good while you have them though.
customer_reviews.author: KatieB

customer_reviews.title: Works but quality could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Quality could be better. Used these when we went camping. The wrap around the bamboo shaft began to unravel after first use.
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have a relatively large deck and being able to place these at the 4 corners was helpful for eliminating bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Banks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - fair price
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Decent quality. Would totally buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice and much cheaper than similar ones at local Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality tikis
customer_reviews.text: Used these to deter mosquitoes/ setup a perimeter during a backyard camp out. They’re sturdy and look nice
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Decent basic lighting, nice flames
customer_reviews.text: They work how they are supposed to. But apparently they can get a little moldy. Should have taken them inside
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFrequentBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Same price as a set of new canisters, so I turned my old bases into mobile drink holder stakes.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerOfAllTheThings

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few months ago. We’ve had some rough weather since I set them out and they have held up well. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Frailey

customer_reviews.title: Good torches , this order had mold on them.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars as I’ve bought these before and they were great, although I prefer the metal ones. The last order showed up very moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Marksy

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll be buying solar ones this year so I don't have to replace the canister!
customer_reviews.author: Trina P. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are as pictured, but if its windy they will be blown down
customer_reviews.author: smileyface919

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are intended for, but they got moldy very quick.
customer_reviews.author: justin s

customer_reviews.title: Had them out for 3 days, rained one day ...
customer_reviews.text: Had them out for 3 days, rained one day for s short time while we were not home, they ended up moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rineer

customer_reviews.title: Kept the party going
customer_reviews.text: Holds enough fuel for a 5-6 hr backyard soiree. Great price--should last en entire summer.
customer_reviews.author: Dcsfinest7

customer_reviews.title: These will mold in less than 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and had them on my porch for three days and they all molded!!! Didn’t even get a chance to light them. Returning them ASAP. Save yourself the headache and don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Provides insect protection and adequate lighting
customer_reviews.text: Well made tourches that provide that special glow For outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mandell

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for our backyard during a Christmas Party. Loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love to put them around us during our camping trips and they looks very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Looks great around the pool
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our backyard. Lasted all summer long before Florida weather wore it out.
customer_reviews.author: DVP

customer_reviews.title: Large cap
customer_reviews.text: The large twist off cap is great easy to pour into, well made same price as a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Porta Z

customer_reviews.title: Didn't use them
customer_reviews.text: Rating them, however did not use them. The package was small, but the contents inside looked strong
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice torches, but may be expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Work well on our patio but you need to check around for the best price.
customer_reviews.author: JKBinVA

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: It caught on fire in an hour and a half. No wind. Used the correct oil
customer_reviews.author: puppy

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute and functional but it’s almost impossible to reopen the canisters to refill.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Junk. 2 of the 4 I ordered fell apart and came unraveled taking off the plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Os Cranz

customer_reviews.title: Love our torches
customer_reviews.text: We love our torches. They work great for mosquitoes and in the evening they make our backyard look very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Good torch, dumb extinguishing system
customer_reviews.text: Functions exactly like a tiki torch would, but the caps to extinguish the flame are of a stupid design because half the time they catch alight too.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Mason

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 4pack, received only 1
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 4 pack, however received only 1 Tiki Torch. Cannot find a way to contact seller. Will have to return and request refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne A. Bigio

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction, but they work well. Dont expect them to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Two of the tiki torches were broken upon arrival. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold!
customer_reviews.text: Completely covered in mold in less than two weeks outside. Only used 3 times and kept out of the rain. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: was burning fine 1/2 hour later whole thing was on fire
customer_reviews.author: dldss

customer_reviews.title: These were great
customer_reviews.text: I filled the canisters up about half way with fuel and the burned for about 5 hrs the were great. I had 5 of them and the lit up a sizable back yard
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Tikis were a good size and the flame was great
customer_reviews.text: Tikis were a good size and the flame was great. you do have to buy your own tiki fluid but thats it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon German

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with these torches. Needs to have a way to get it into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Used these tourches tonight. An hour into them burning, one of them caught on fire. Let’s see if the others last more than 1 day. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rohay

customer_reviews.title: Missing caps
customer_reviews.text: Tiki torches—what could be wrong? I expected no issues with these but 2 of the 4 didn’t even come with caps to put the flames out. I would return them but my husband already stuck them in the ground. Purchase at your own risk regarding recieving all pieces of the product.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: I was rip off
customer_reviews.text: I feel that I was rip off because it says set of 12 and at the end I received 4 I noticed that the pack is of 4 but from the beginning says clearly set of 12 please make the add that is a set of 4 instead of 12
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up! We used them for the backyard we had a fire and the torches just added an elegant touch. The smell in the beginning was a little strong but after that just great!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Broome

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: alittle rusty but will still be using these for my wedding
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like paying money for broken things to arrive
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 6 I ordered came broken. Unable to put them back together.
customer_reviews.author: Regena Foster

customer_reviews.title: ... with the lighter fluid but it doesn’t I was disappointed with that
customer_reviews.text: I thought these came with the lighter fluid but it doesn’t I was disappointed with that.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and ease to light
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They work great by my firepit as well as on my deck
customer_reviews.author: annette jajko

customer_reviews.title: Only received one??
customer_reviews.text: I thought this listing was for a set of 4 but I only received 1. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was missing a tank and wick for one of the torches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep mosquitos away
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well as tiki brand. doesn’t keep mosquitos away.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY HORRIBLE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: These suck. After one fill with channel locks I could only open 1 out of 3 in dry weather. This is a crappy disposable product. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can not wait to use, came all together can not complain on shipping
customer_reviews.author: cayla

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great used for backyard luau for my family..love em
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and the canisters were included
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, easy to set up and the canisters were included!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: TIKI Brand 57-Inch Luau Bamboo Torches - 4 pack
product_meta.description: Natural flame outdoor torches help set the mood & add fun, decor & ambiance to your backyard or patio. Easy-to-use bamboo torches bring a touch of relaxed style & flare to any outdoor patio space. These TIKI Brand bamboo torches features an island-inspired design crafted from all natural, renewable bamboo & stand 57" tall. The classic bamboo-weave construction reflects the easy going spirit of the tropics & is perfect for outlining a laid-back entertainment space. Use with TIKI Brand torch fuel & enjoyup to five hours of burn time. Each torch comes with a 12-oz. Easy pour wide mouth canister for fewer spills, less mess & a cleaner more enjoyable experience. This 4 Pack of TIKI Brand bamboo torches come Complete with four 12-oz. Easy pour wide mouth Canisters with flameguards, long-lasting fiberglass wicks, & snuffers to extinguish the flames when the Party's over. TIKI Brand torch fuel sold separately.
feature_bullets: AUTHENTIC TIKI BAMBOO TORCHES: These feature an island-inspired design crafted from all-natural, renewable bamboo and stand 57 inches tall.

EASY & MESS FREE: Each torch comes with a 12-oz. Easy Pour Wide Mouth Canister for fewer spills, less mess and a cleaner more enjoyable experience. This 4 pack of TIKI Brand Bamboo Torches come complete with four 12-ounce Easy Pour wide mouth canisters with flameguards, long-lasting fiberglass wicks and snuffers to extinguish the flames when the party’s over. Burns up to 5 hours with each 12-oz. fill
PERSONAL PARADISE: We can help you create an outdoor paradise with our easy-to-use, long lasting TIKI products, designed in a wide variety of styles to suit any yard, garden, lawn, patio, or porch
BEST OF THE BACKYARD: For over 60 years we've made outdoor torches to illuminate your yard or garden along with candles, wicks, stakes, stands, torch fuel & other accessories to light your landscape

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars909 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
